## Shortcuts

<table class = "deftab">
  <tr>
    <td>Execute line</td>
    <td>Ctrl + Enter</td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
    <td>Restart R session</td>
    <td>Ctrl + Shift + F10</td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
    <td>Clear workspace **(RZ)**</td>
    <td>Ctrl + Shift + F8</td>
  </tr>
    <tr>
    <td>Clear all plots **(RZ)**</td>
    <td>Ctrl + Shift + F9</td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
    <td>Go to script panel</td>
    <td>Ctrl + 1</td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
    <td>Go to console panel</td>
    <td>Ctrl + 2</td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
    <td>Clear console</td>
    <td>Ctrl + L</td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
    <td>Comment</td>
    <td>Ctrl + Shift + C</td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
    <td>Pipe</td>
    <td>Ctrl + Shift + M</td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
    <td>Assignment operator</td>
    <td>Alt + -</td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
    <td>Help</td>
    <td>F1</td>
  </tr>
    <tr>
    <td>Undo</td>
    <td>Ctrl + Z</td>
  </tr>
    <tr>
    <td>Redo</td>
    <td>Ctrl + Shift + Z</td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
    <td>**Sections**</td>
    <td></td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
    <td>New section</td>
    <td>Ctrl + Shift + R</td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
    <td>Fold all</td>
    <td>Alt + O</td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
    <td>Unfold all</td>
    <td>Shift + Alt + O</td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
    <td>**Mark**</td>
    <td></td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
    <td>Mark</td>
    <td>Shift + Left/Right/Up/Down</td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
    <td>Mark all</td>
    <td>Ctrl + Shift + Left/Right</td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
    <td>**Markdown**</td>
    <td></td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
    <td>Knit</td>
    <td>Ctrl + Shift + K</td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
    <td>Insert chunk</td>
    <td>Ctrl + Alt + i</td>
  </tr>
</table>

Shortcuts which are modified are marked with **(RZ)**. You can define your own Shortcuts in RStudio at Tools > Modify Keyboard Shortcuts...

Find all shortcuts [here](https://support.rstudio.com/hc/en-us/articles/200711853-Keyboard-Shortcuts)
